title: Tokyo Design Story
overview: Mutsumi is a rookie designer and she is employed at small design company Lemon Design. She is busy with prep work for magazine shoots, like scouting locations and working with photographers. She has doubts about her work not being that of a designer. Tetsuko senses Mutsumi's feelings. She tells Mutsumi that she is a salaryman. Mutsumi doesn't understand why Tetsuko told her that.
